meanings.definition: A person who plays the trombone.
meanings.sent1: The trombonists performed a beautiful melody at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The band was looking for talented trombonists to join their group.
meanings.sent3: The trombonists decided to start a brass band in their neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of life, the trombonists add depth and richness to the music.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the trombonists echoed through the hall, captivating the audience.

meanings.sent1: Several trombonists were practicing together in the music room.
meanings.sent2: The trombonists in the jazz ensemble played with great skill and passion.
meanings.sent3: At the music store, the trombonists tried out different mouthpieces for their instruments.
meanings.sent4: The group of trombonists marched proudly in the parade, showcasing their unity.
meanings.sent5: Among all the musicians, the trombonists stood out with their powerful sound.
